urls.title: Flooding advice
urls.description: Flooding can have devastating impacts and it is important that you are prepared. For advice on what to do to protect yourself, your property and your community before, during and after a flood download the Sefton Be Flood Ready leaflet below. You can also visit www.floodready.co.uk, a new website designed to raise awareness and knowledge of flood risk in the North West to enable our communities to become more resilient to flooding in the future or sign up for flood warnings. For overflowing public

text:
